game.name: Sofia Take Care Of Clover
game.description:
Clover is a cute of Sofia. Today her pet rabbit has got injured while chasing a butterfly. This has made Sofia so sad. This little girl has approached the nearby hospital, but could not find anyone else. Someone told her about you who also has good knowledge about the medical field. Would you like to help her pet to get recovered from the injury? You would also give him a needful spa after that. Join Sofia Take Care of Clover and help the little girl to take a surgery for her pet and then make a spa for him!
Firstly, remove all the thorns from his body and then place the bandage on the injured parts. Also remember to remove the bandages to go further. Then use the brush to clean him up. Give him the stitches and apply the liquid medicine on various injured body parts! Follow all the other instructions to complete the goal of this brand new doctor game! Once it is done, make sure to give him the spa to make him shine like before. 
After giving him the spa, make sure to help the cute rabbit to choose the awesome outfits. Mix and match as many clothing and accessory options as you can to create a perfect dress for him! Check out more girl games on our free online game website where you are guaranteed to have the best fun without download! Give our animal games a try to enjoy the best time online!
